title: Crashing in game
body:
I was playing a game of league and I lagged out
I try to join back and it says "The game had crash" will I get a leaverbuster for bullshit?

replies.body: Leaverbuster will only be added to an account after multiple leaves, and not a single game.  If you have had leaves recently, then it's likely you will recieve a lower priority queue.  The best way to overcome this is by resolving whatever is causing you to leave.  I'd be happy to help, but I need some more information on what's going on.  When exactly are you crashing in-game?  Do you receive any error responses and what does it say, or is it a bugsplat?  Let me know!
